description.value:
Consumable (Ammunition)

As an action, you can apply this calibrator to one vibroweapon or pair of handwraps within 5 feet, granting it a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls for 1 minute. This bonus is in addition to any bonuses granted by the weapon. Additionally, for the duration, the weapon gains the shocking 14 property. If it already has the shocking property, its shocking number increases by 2, to a maximum of 18. Lastly, if the weapon is not enhanced, it becomes enhanced for the duration.

Â 

Electrifying calibrator

As an action, you can apply this calibrator to one vibroweapon or pair of handwraps within 5 feet, granting it a +1 bonus to damage rolls for 1 minute. This bonus is in addition to any bonuses granted by the weapon. Additionally, for the duration, the weapon gains the shocking 13 property. If it already has the shocking property, its shocking number increases by 1, to a maximum of 18.
